description:
Serving clients throughout Frederick and Montgomery counties and beyond from their law office in Frederick, Maryland, the top-rated, award-winning attorneys at Beckman, Schmalzle, Georgelas & Ross are fully committed to helping you achieve your goals and the favorable outcomes you seek for your legal challenges involving any of the following:

• Family law and divorce, including child custody and support and all other related matters
• Criminal defense for all types of felony and misdemeanor charges
• Personal injury
• Estate planning
• General civil litigation

With an additional law office in Leesburg, Virginia, they have grown to become one of their region's premier full-service legal practices, and they have achieved this level of success by adhering to their core principle that people matter.

Unlike other law firms, they will not treat you as just another case or an item on an income-expense sheet. Instead, they promise to treat you with the same compassion and integrity they would a member of their own family as they work hard to help you achieve the positive results you deserve as efficiently and cost-effectively as possible.

In recognition for their unmatched client service, their lawyers have earned 10 Best in Client Satisfaction Awards from both the American Institute of Criminal Defense Attorneys as well as the American Institute of Family Law Attorneys. Additionally, they have received consistent top rankings and endorsements from their peers, including Top 40 Under 40 designations from The National Trial Lawyers.

To speak with one of their team members, you can contact Beckman, Schmalzle, Georgelas & Ross for an initial consultation. In these uncertain times, they also offer virtual consultations to help keep you and your loved ones safe and healthy.
